public Client()
Default constructor

public Client(java.lang.String host)
Constructor to be used when creating a new Client that uses the default port

Parameters:
host - The host where this task client is running

Client

public Client(java.lang.String host,
              int port)
Constructor to be used when creating a new Client to be registered

Parameters:
host - The host where this task client is running
port - The port number the task client is listening on

Client

public Client(java.lang.String host,
              int port,
              int freeResources,
              java.lang.String schedule,
              Client.State state,
              java.util.Date lastUpdate,
              int maxResources,
              Task[] tasks,
              int version,
              java.lang.String mapDir)
Constructor

Parameters:
host - The hostname this task client is reachable at
port - The port number the task client's agent is listening on
freeResources - The number of free resources currently available on this client
schedule - The client's ACTIVE schedule; crontab format
state - The current state of this client
lastUpdate - The last time this client was updated
maxResources - The max number of resources for this client
tasks - The array of tasks this client is capable of running
version - The version number of this client
mapDir - The mapdir setting for this client

addTask

public boolean addTask(Task task)
Add a new task to the Client; will NOT replace an existing task with the same taskId

Parameters:
task - The new task to add
Returns:
True if the task was added or false otherwise; will return false if argument is null or if a task with the same taskId already exists for the client

handlesTask

public boolean handlesTask(java.lang.String taskId)
Determine if this client can run tasks of the given type

Parameters:
taskId - The type of task to check
Returns:
True if this client can run tasks of type 'taskId' or false otherwise

getTask

public Task getTask(java.lang.String taskId)
Get the task for the given taskId

Parameters:
taskId - The task id to query
Returns:
The Task definition for the given task id on this client or null if this client cannot run tasks of type 'taskId'

removeTask

public boolean removeTask(Task t)

Remove a task from the Client's list of tasks, if it exists.

Removes the first task that matches the one given using an equals() comparison

Parameters:
t - The task to be removed
Returns:
True if a task was removed from the Client's list or false otherwise
